assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Raw WES data have been deposited in Sequence Read Archive (SRA) database under accession number PRJNA765777. The RNA-sequencing data have been deposited in the Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) repository under accession number GSE184325. Other data that support the findings of this study are available from the corresponding authors upon reasonable request.
